IS_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
IS_STRING: This field must be a string.
MIN_LENGTH: This field must be at least {constraints.0} characters long.
IS_UUID: This field must be a valid UUID.
IS_ENUM: This field must be a valid enum value.
IS_LATITUDE: Latitude must be a valid latitude value (between -90 and 90).
IS_LONGITUDE: Longitude must be a valid longitude value (between -180 and 180).
LONGITUDE_REQUIRED: Longitude is required if latitude or radius is provided.
RADIUS_REQUIRED: Radius is required if latitude or longitude is provided.
IS_NUMBER: This field must be a number.
RADIUS_MIN: Radius must be at least {constraints.0} km.
IS_ARRAY: This field must be an array.
IS_UUID_EACH: Each ID in the array must be a valid UUID.
